message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $100. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite there yet.  I'm willing to come down to $95.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I'm getting close, but I still think I can get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $92 for it.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to work with you. How about $94?  I'm not sure I can go any lower.
I appreciate your willingness to work with me, but I'm still a bit away from being comfortable. I'm willing to pay $91 for it.
